Scanning R-Tree Indexes
[Scanning]

Collaboration diagram for Scanning R-Tree Indexes:

Detailed Description

To iterate over the {key,value} pairs in a spatial index, construct an instance of the class scan_rt_i, q.v. That page contains examples.
